echo_pin.docs:
**, [Pin Schema](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin-schema)**: The input pin on which to wait for the echo.

*See also: [Ultrasonic Distance Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ultrasonic.html#configuration-variables)*

id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID used for code generation.

*See also: [Ultrasonic Distance Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ultrasonic.html#configuration-variables)*

pulse_time.docs:
**, [Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The duration for which the trigger pin will be active. Defaults to `10us`.

*See also: [Ultrasonic Distance Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ultrasonic.html#configuration-variables)*

timeout.docs:
**, float**: The number of meters for the timeout. Most sensors can only sense up to 2 meters. Defaults to 2 meters.

*See also: [Ultrasonic Distance Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ultrasonic.html#configuration-variables)*

trigger_pin.docs:
**, [Pin Schema](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin-schema)**: The output pin to periodically send the trigger pulse to.

*See also: [Ultrasonic Distance Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ultrasonic.html#configuration-variables)*

update_interval.docs:
**, [Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The interval to check the sensor. Defaults to `60s`.

*See also: [Ultrasonic Distance Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ultrasonic.html#configuration-variables)*
